name: Robolution (Event Horizon School)
description:
The goal was to create a tragicomic situation, which would have divided the players, between those who stop to reflect on the death of each robot, and those who instead get a hearty laugh.

The events of "Robolution" take place inside an abandoned factory, but still in operation, in an unspecified place. What the game tells is the first of numerous extreme attempts to find freedom, desperate gestures made by robots, whose sole purpose is to end their death.

DEVELOPED BY:

Clippin'Dog Studio

(EVENT HORIZON SCHOOL MILAN, YEAR 1, 2020/2021)

Programming:

  • Kristian Iovino
  • Simone Battaglia

Game Design:

  • Matteo De Nuzzo
  • Federico Uccelli
  • Francesco Zicchieri

3D Art:

  • Chiara Castelnovo
  • Samuele Giuliani
  • Vince Henriquez

Concept Art:

  • Andrea Garzoglio
  • Marta Chiarin
  • Mattia Hu
  • Ottavia Ferrara

Download and unzip, then launch the .exe file.
